parani bogambara bandhanagaraye nirodhayanayata lakwemin sitina randawiyan pirisak thamantada pi.si.aar. parikshana sidukarannayi illa ehi wahalaya matha nagi ada aarambha kala wirodhathawa paswaruwe awasan kala.kese wethath bandhanagara komasaris janaral thushara upuldeniya ada pawathi¬† madhya hamuwakadi kiya sitiye saukhya upades nothaka owun thamanwa kolambaa bandhanagarawalata maru kara yawana lesa illa nirodhayana nithinta awanatha nowi melesa wirodhathawaye niratha wu bawayi.bogambara bandhanagarayen eeye dinayeda aasadithayan hayadeneku handunagena thibu athara diwayina pura bandhanagara aashrithawa radawiyan 158 deneku kowidi aasadithayin lesa handunagena thibenawa.eeta amatharawa bandhanagara niyamakawarun 3 deneku saha bandhanagara waidya karya mandalayata ayath aushadha sanyojakawariyakata da wairasaya aasadanaya wi athi bawayi bandhanagara departhamenthuwa sandahan kale.me wana wita diwayina pura bandhanagara radawiyan 9500kata pamana pi.si.aar. parikshana sidukara thibenawa.
